DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm metastatic colorectal cancer Presence measurable metastases No previous treatment metastatic cancer No presence Central Nervous System metastases No coexist malignancy malignancy diagnose within last 5 year exception basal cell carcinoma cervical cancer situ Any evidence severe uncontrolled systemic disease ( e.g . unstable uncompensated respiratory , cardiac , hepatic renal disease )
